00011 ORXmlPlist::ORXmlPlist(const char* fullHeaderAsString, size_t lengthOfBuffer)
00012 { 
00013   fDictionary = NULL; 
00014   fDoValidate = false;
00015 
00016   if (fullHeaderAsString) LoadXmlPlist(fullHeaderAsString, lengthOfBuffer);
00017 }

00019 ORXmlPlist::~ORXmlPlist() 
00020 { 
00021   if (fDictionary != NULL) delete fDictionary;

00023 
00024 bool ORXmlPlist::LoadXmlPlistFromFile(const char* fileName)
00025 {
00026   // We must use a local buffer but then we must handle the memory of the
00027   // buffer.
00028   // We assume that we get JUST the header.
00029   std::ifstream headerFile(fileName);
00030   if(!headerFile.good()) {
00031     ORLog(kError) << "Error opening file: " << fileName << std::endl;
00032     return false;
00033   }
00034   fRawXML.ReadFile(headerFile);
00035   return LoadXmlPlist(fRawXML.Data(), fRawXML.Length());
00036 }
00037 
00038 bool ORXmlPlist::LoadXmlPlist(const char* fullHeaderAsString, size_t lengthOfBuffer)
00039 {
00040   if(ORLogger::GetSeverity() <= ORLogger::kDebug)
00041   {
00042     // dump the header out for debugging purposes.
00043     std::ofstream headerFile("tmp_header.xml");
00044     if (!headerFile.good()) {
00045       ORLog(kError) << "LoadXmlPlist(): You are running in debug mode. " 
00046                     << "Problem opening file tmp_header.xml. "
00047                     << "Do you have write permissions to the directory from "
00048                     << "which you are running your application?" << std::endl;
00049       return false;
00050     }
00051     headerFile.write(fullHeaderAsString, lengthOfBuffer);
00052     headerFile.close();
00053   }
00054 
00055   ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadXmlPlist(): Parsing..." << std::endl;
00056   TDOMParser domParser;
00057   if(!fDoValidate) {
00058       ORLog(kWarning) << "LoadXmlPlist(): xml plist validation is disabled.  "
00059                       << "If you are concerned about the integrity of your "
00060                       << "data and wish to turn on validation, call "
00061                       << "ORXmlPlist::ValidateXML() before loading your "
00062                       << "data file. Typical applications may activate this "
00063                       << "option via ORDataProcManager::ValidateHeaderXML(). "
00064                       << "To use this option, you must be connected to the "
00065                       << "internet." << std::endl;
00066   }
00067   domParser.SetValidate(fDoValidate);
00068   domParser.ParseBuffer(fullHeaderAsString, lengthOfBuffer);
00069   TXMLDocument* doc = domParser.GetXMLDocument();
00070   if (doc == NULL) {
00071     ORLog(kError) << "LoadXmlPlist(): couldn't parse buffer. Parse code was " 
00072                   << domParser.GetParseCode() << std::endl;
00073     return false;
00074   }
00075   if(((size_t)fRawXML.Length()) != lengthOfBuffer) { 
00076     //we have to copy to fRawXML.  Making sure we're not copying again.
00077     fRawXML.Resize(lengthOfBuffer);
00078   }
00079   fRawXML.Replace(0, lengthOfBuffer, fullHeaderAsString, lengthOfBuffer);
00080 
00081   ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadXmlPlist(): Getting root node..." << std::endl;
00082   TXMLNode* rootNode = doc->GetRootNode();
00083   if (rootNode == NULL) {
00084     ORLog(kError) << "LoadXmlPlist(): root node was NULL in buffer " 
00085                   << std::endl;
00086     return false;
00087   }
00088   if(std::string(rootNode->GetNodeName()) != "plist") {
00089     ORLog(kError) << "LoadXmlPlist(): root node was not a plist in buffer"
00090                   << std::endl;
00091     return false;
00092   }
00093 
00094   ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadXmlPlist(): Getting root dictionary..." << std::endl;
00095   TXMLNode* rootDict = FindChildByName("dict", rootNode);
00096   if (rootDict == NULL) {
00097     ORLog(kError) << "LoadXmlPlist(): couldn't find root dictionary in buffer" 
00098                   << std::endl;
00099     return false;
00100   }
00101 
00102   ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadXmlPlist(): Loading root dictionary..." << std::endl;
00103   if (fDictionary != NULL) delete fDictionary;
00104   fDictionary = new ORDictionary("rootDict"); // deleted in deconstructor
00105   return LoadDictionary(rootDict, fDictionary); 
00106 }
00107 
00108 const ORVDictValue* ORXmlPlist::LookUp(std::string key) const 
00109 { 
00110   if(fDictionary == NULL) {
00111     ORLog(kError) << "LookUp(): dictionary not loaded" << std::endl;
00112     return 0;
00113   }
00114   return fDictionary->LookUp(key); 
00115 }
00116 
00117 bool ORXmlPlist::LoadDictionary(TXMLNode* dictNode, ORDictionary* dictionary)
00118 {
00119   ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadDictionary(): Loading dictionary " 
00120                 << dictionary->GetName() << "..." << std::endl;
00121   TXMLNode* child = dictNode->GetChildren();
00122   while (child != NULL && child->HasNextNode()) {
00123     while (child->HasNextNode() && std::string(child->GetNodeName()) != "key") {
00124       child = child->GetNextNode();
00125     }
00126     if (!child->HasNextNode()) break;
00127     std::string keyname = child->GetText();
00128     child = child->GetNextNode();
00129     if (!child->HasNextNode()) break;
00130 
00131     while (child->HasNextNode() && std::string(child->GetNodeName()) == "text") {
00132       child = child->GetNextNode();
00133     }
00134     std::string valtype = child->GetNodeName();
00135     if(ORLogger::GetSeverity() <= ORLogger::kDebug) {
00136       ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadDictionary(): Handling " << valtype << " " << keyname << std::endl;
00137     }
00138     ORVDictValue* dictValue = NULL;
00139     if (valtype == "dict") {
00140       dictValue = new ORDictionary(keyname);
00141       LoadDictionary(child, (ORDictionary*) dictValue); 
00142     } else if (valtype == "string") {
00143       const char* str = child->GetText();
00144       if(str == NULL) dictValue = new ORDictValueS("");
00145       else dictValue = new ORDictValueS(str);
00146     } else if (valtype == "real") {
00147       dictValue = new ORDictValueR(atof(child->GetText()));
00148     } else if (valtype == "integer") {
00149       dictValue = new ORDictValueI(atoi(child->GetText()));
00150     } else if (valtype == "false") {
00151       dictValue = new ORDictValueB(false);
00152     } else if (valtype == "true") {
00153       dictValue = new ORDictValueB(true);
00154     } else if (valtype == "array") {
00155       dictValue = new ORDictValueA(keyname);
00156       LoadArray(child, (ORDictValueA*) dictValue);
00157     } else {
00158       ORLog(kWarning) << "LoadDictionary(): unsupported value type " << valtype << " with name " << keyname << std::endl;
00159     }
00160     dictionary->LoadEntry(keyname, dictValue);
00161     ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadDictionary(): loaded entry " << keyname << std::endl;
00162     if (keyname == "dataId") {
00163       ORLog(kDebug) << dictionary->GetName() + "::LoadDictionary(): dataId = " 
00164                     << ((ORDictValueI*) dictValue)->GetI() << std::endl;
00165     }
00166     child = child->GetNextNode();
00167   }
00168   ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadDictionary(): Finished loading dictionary " 
00169                 << dictionary->GetName() << "..." << std::endl;
00170   return true;
00171 }
00172 
00173 bool ORXmlPlist::LoadArray(TXMLNode* arrayNode, ORDictValueA* dictValueA)
00174 {
00175   ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadArray(): Loading an array " << std::endl;
00176   TXMLNode* child = arrayNode->GetChildren();
00177   while (child != NULL && child->HasNextNode()) {
00178     while (child->HasNextNode() && std::string(child->GetNodeName()) == "text") {
00179       child = child->GetNextNode();
00180     }
00181     if (!child->HasNextNode()) break;
00182     std::string valtype = child->GetNodeName();
00183     ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadArray(): Handling " << valtype << std::endl;
00184     ORVDictValue* dictValue = NULL;
00185     if (valtype == "dict") {
00186       dictValue = new ORDictionary;
00187       LoadDictionary(child, (ORDictionary*) dictValue); 
00188     }
00189     else if (valtype == "string") {
00190       const char* str = child->GetText();
00191       if(str == NULL) dictValue = new ORDictValueS("");
00192       else dictValue = new ORDictValueS(str);
00193     } else if (valtype == "real") {
00194       dictValue = new ORDictValueR(atof(child->GetText()));
00195     } else if (valtype == "integer") {
00196       dictValue = new ORDictValueI(atoi(child->GetText()));
00197     } else if (valtype == "false") {
00198       dictValue = new ORDictValueB(false);
00199     } else if (valtype == "true") {
00200       dictValue = new ORDictValueB(true);
00201     } else {
00202       ORLog(kWarning) << "LoadArray(): unsupported value type " << valtype << std::endl;
00203     }
00204     dictValueA->LoadValue(dictValue);
00205     child = child->GetNextNode();
00206   }
00207   ORLog(kDebug) << "LoadArray(): Finished loading array " << std::endl;
00208   return true;
00209 }
00210 
00211 TXMLNode* ORXmlPlist::FindChildByName(const char* name, TXMLNode* parent)
00212 {
00213   if (name == NULL || parent == NULL) return NULL;
00214 
00215   TXMLNode* child = parent->GetChildren();
00216   while (child != NULL && child->HasNextNode()) {
00217     ORLog(kDebug) << "FindChildByName(): examining child " << child->GetNodeName() << std::endl;
00218     if (std::string(child->GetNodeName()) == name) return child;
00219     child = child->GetNextNode();
00220   }
00221 
00222   ORLog(kWarning) << "FindChildByName(): couldn't find child '" << name 
00223                   << "' under parent '" << parent->GetNodeName() << "'." << std::endl;
00224 
00225   return NULL;
00226 }
